name: Roguebot Arena
description:
Roguebot Arena was created for the GMS2Jam with GameMaker Studio 2.

It is a turnbased roguelike where you have to guide your robot through a maze of arena rooms to find the exit teleporting you away from here!

The game is full of 8x8 pixel programmer's art and terrible blips and blops but offers a lot of stuff under the hood:

  • random maze generation for replayability,
  • random room generation where tilemaps and collision grids are filled on the fly with GML code,
  • basic weapon system with weapon damage, range and energy consumption (currently 2 different weapons are added as an example),
  • stupid bots and annoying spawners to complicate your robot's life,
  • turn based movement system with expandable behavior for your own bots - just one action to implement new behavior,
  • simple flexible menu system
  • and the source code is provided for your amusement ;-)
